pages.text: (When our posol ist Abraham dobry zvest Isaac's narodenie) they i said My je on our way annihilate ludia z ze town (Sodom) its ludia bol zlomyselny
He said Lot zivobytie there They said My je fully aware z everyone kto zivot v it My robit z course save him jeho rodina except jeho manzelka; ona doomed
When our posol arrived Lot's miesto they mistreated he zmiast ich presence. they said nie Have fear nie znepokojit! My save ona tvoj rodina except tvoj manzelka; ona doomed
My pour ludia z this town disaster z sky consequence ich wickedness
My lavy standing some z ich zrucaniny do serve profound lekcia ludia chapat
Do Midyan my sent ich brat Shu aib. He said O moj zaludnit ona kult GOD seek Posledny Dni nie roam zem corruptingly
They disbelieved him consequently zemetrasenie annihilated them; they lavy dead ich domov by rano
Similarly 'Aad Thamoud annihilated This robit manifest ona through ich zrucaniny. devil zdobit ich robota ich oci diverted them chodnicek vecer they had oci
